Static Public Member Functions

static wxExLexers * Get (bool createOnDemand=true)
 Returns the lexers object.
static wxExLexers * Set (wxExLexers *lexers)
 Sets the object as the current one, returns the pointer to the previous current object (both the parameter and returned value may be NULL).

Detailed Description

Collection of all lexers.

The lexers are read in from lexers.xml, this is done automatically during the first Get call.

Member Function Documentation

void wxExLexers::ApplyGlobalStyles ( wxStyledTextCtrl *  stc)

Sets global styles (and colours and indicators) for current theme for specified component.

const wxString wxExLexers::ApplyMacro ( const wxString &  text) const

Applies macro to text: if text is referring to a macro, text is replaced by the macro value.

Otherwise the same text is returned.

static wxExLexers* wxExLexers::Get ( bool  createOnDemand = true) [static]

Returns the lexers object.

If this is the first invocation, and createOnDemand is true, it also invokes Read.

const wxString wxExLexers::GetTheme ( ) const

Returns the current theme, as present in the config.

It checks whether the config theme is really present as a theme, if not, the empty theme is returned.

bool wxExLexers::Read ( )

Reads all lexers (first clears them) from file.

Returns true if the file could be read and loaded as valid xml file.

static wxExLexers* wxExLexers::Set ( wxExLexers *  lexers) [static]

Sets the object as the current one, returns the pointer to the previous current object (both the parameter and returned value may be NULL).

bool wxExLexers::ShowDialog ( wxWindow *  parent,
wxString &  lexer,
const wxString &  caption = _("Enter Lexer") 
) const

Shows a dialog with all lexers, allowing you to choose one.

Returns true and fills the lexer if you selected one.

Parameters:
parentparent
lexerIf you specify an existing lexer, it is selected in the list. If you press OK, the lexer is set to the selected lexer.
captioncaption
bool wxExLexers::ShowThemeDialog ( wxWindow *  parent,
const wxString &  caption = _("Enter Theme") 
)

Shows a dialog with all themes, allowing you to choose one.

Returns true and sets current theme if you select one.

Parameters:

captioncaption
